# Nua and Veya
## Overview
---
## Connections
Child: [[Prealat]] ; Nua and Veya are the daugters of Prealat.
Child: [[Yenuan]] ; Nua and Veya are the daughters of Yenuan.
General Family: [[Hahnu]] ; Hahnu is the uncle of Nua and Veya.
General Family: [[Kalesh]] ; Kalesh, Nua, and Veya are siblings.
Arbitrary Connection To: [[Tammy Quint]] ; Tammy worships Nua.
